verses.verse: Let brotherly <S%G5360><s%> love <S%G5360><s%> continue. <S%G3306><s%>

Be not forgetful <S%G1950><s%> to entertain <S%G5381><s%> strangers: <S%G5381><s%> for thereby <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5026><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> have entertained <S%G3579><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> unawares. <S%G2990><s%>

Remember <S%G3403><s%> them that are in bonds, <S%G1198><s%> as bound <S%G4887><s%> with them; and them which suffer <S%G2558><s%> adversity, <S%G2558><s%> as being <S%G5607><s%> yourselves <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in the body. <S%G4983><s%>

Marriage <S%G1062><s%> is honorable <S%G5093><s%> in all, <S%G3956><s%> and the bed <S%G2845><s%> undefiled: <S%G283><s%> but fornicators <S%G4205><s%> and adulterers <S%G3432><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> will judge. <S%G2919><s%>

Let your <S%G3588><s%> conversation <S%G5158><s%> be without <S%G866><s%> covetousness; <S%G866><s%> and be content <S%G714><s%> with such <S%G3588><s%> things as you have: <S%G3918><s%> for he has said, <S%G2046><s%> I will never <S%G3364><s%> leave <S%G447><s%> you, nor <S%G3761><s%> <S%G3364><s%> forsake <S%G1459><s%> you.

So <S%G5620><s%> that we may boldly <S%G2292><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> is my helper, <S%G998><s%> and I will not fear <S%G5399><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> shall do to me.

Remember <S%G3421><s%> them which have <S%G3918><s%> the rule <S%G2233><s%> over you, who <S%G3748><s%> have <S%G3918><s%> spoken <S%G2980><s%> to you the word <S%G3056><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> follow, <S%G3401><s%> considering <S%G333><s%> the end <S%G1545><s%> of their conversation. <S%G391><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> yesterday, <S%G5504><s%> and to day, <S%G4594><s%> and for ever. <S%G165><s%>

Be not carried <S%G4064><s%> about <S%G4064><s%> with divers <S%G4164><s%> and strange <S%G3581><s%> doctrines. <S%G1322><s%> For it is a good <S%G2570><s%> thing that the heart <S%G2588><s%> be established <S%G950><s%> with grace; <S%G5485><s%> not with meats, <S%G1033><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> have <S%G3918><s%> not profited <S%G5623><s%> them that have <S%G3918><s%> been occupied <S%G4043><s%> therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3639><s%>.

We have <S%G2192><s%> an altar, <S%G2379><s%> whereof <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3739><s%> they have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> right <S%G1849><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> which serve <S%G3000><s%> the tabernacle. <S%G4633><s%>

For the bodies <S%G4983><s%> of those <S%G5130><s%> beasts, <S%G2226><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> is brought <S%G1533><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sanctuary <S%G39><s%> by the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> for sin, <S%G266><s%> are burned <S%G2618><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> the camp. <S%G3925><s%>

Why <S%G1352><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> that he might sanctify <S%G37><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> with his own <S%G2398><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> suffered <S%G3958><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> the gate. <S%G4439><s%>
Let us go <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> therefore <S%G5106><s%> to him without <S%G1854><s%> the camp, <S%G3925><s%> bearing <S%G5342><s%> his reproach. <S%G3680><s%>
For here <S%G5602><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> we no <S%G3756><s%> continuing <S%G3306><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> but we seek <S%G1934><s%> one to come. <S%G3195><s%>

By him therefore <S%G3767><s%> let us offer <S%G399><s%> the sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> of praise <S%G133><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> continually, <S%G1275><s%> that is, the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of our lips <S%G5491><s%> giving thanks <S%G3670><s%> to his name. <S%G3686><s%>

But to do <S%G2140><s%> good <S%G2140><s%> and to communicate <S%G2842><s%> forget <S%G1950><s%> not: for with such <S%G5108><s%> sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is well <S%G2100><s%> pleased. <S%G2100><s%>

Obey <S%G3982><s%> them that have the rule <S%G2233><s%> over you, and submit <S%G5226><s%> yourselves: <S%G5216><s%> for they watch <S%G69><s%> for your <S%G5216><s%> souls, <S%G5590><s%> as they that must give <S%G591><s%> account, <S%G3056><s%> that they may do <S%G4160><s%> it with joy, <S%G5479><s%> and not with grief: <S%G4727><s%> for that is unprofitable <S%G255><s%> for you.

Pray <S%G4336><s%> for us: for we trust <S%G3982><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> conscience, <S%G4893><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things willing <S%G2309><s%> to live <S%G390><s%> honestly. <S%G2573><s%>
But I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you the rather <S%G4056><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> that I may be restored <S%G600><s%> to you the sooner. <S%G5032><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of peace, <S%G1515><s%> that brought <S%G321><s%> again <S%G321><s%> from the dead <S%G3498><s%> our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> that great <S%G3173><s%> shepherd <S%G4166><s%> of the sheep, <S%G4263><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of the everlasting <S%G166><s%> covenant, <S%G1242><s%>

Make <S%G2675><s%> you perfect <S%G2675><s%> in every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> his will, <S%G2307><s%> working <S%G4160><s%> in you that which is well pleasing <S%G2101><s%> in his sight, <S%G1799><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

And I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you, brothers, <S%G80><s%> suffer <S%G430><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of exhortation: <S%G3874><s%> for I have written <S%G1989><s%> a letter <S%G1989><s%> to you in few <S%G1024><s%> words.

Know <S%G1097><s%> you that our brother <S%G80><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> is set <S%G630><s%> at <S%G630><s%> liberty; <S%G630><s%> with whom, <S%G3739><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he come <S%G2064><s%> shortly, <S%G5032><s%> I will see <S%G3700><s%> you.
Salute <S%G782><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> them that have the rule <S%G2233><s%> over you, and all <S%G3956><s%> the saints. <S%G40><s%> They of Italy <S%G2482><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> you.
Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with you all. <S%G3956><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> Written to the Hebrews from Italy, by Timothy.
